name: Woobat
description: While inside a cave, if you look up and see lots of heart-shaped marks lining the walls, it’s evidence that Woobat live there.

attacks.name: Unamplified Soundwave
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) If you have any cards in your hand, this attack does nothing.
